targets.expr: SELECT sum("success") FROM "pipeline_metrics" WHERE "env" =~ /^$env$/  AND "job_name" = 'publish-pipeline' AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Daily Peak of Request per Second

targets.expr: sum(rate(nginx_http_requests_total{cluster=~"$cluster"}[5m]))

panels.title: Daily Peaks of Request per Second

targets.expr: (sum(increase(nginx_http_requests_total{cluster=~"$cluster", status!~"2..|3..|5.."}[5m])) by (status) / ignoring(status) group_left sum(increase(nginx_http_requests_total{cluster=~"$cluster"}[5m]))) * 100

(sum(increase(nginx_http_requests_total{cluster=~"$cluster", status!~"2..|3..|4.."}[5m])) by (status) / ignoring(status) group_left sum(increase(nginx_http_requests_total{cluster=~"$cluster"}[5m]))) * 100

sum(sum(increase(nginx_http_requests_total{cluster=~"$cluster", api=~"${api}",status!~"2..|3..|5.."}[5m])) by (api, status) / ignoring(api, status) group_left sum(increase(nginx_http_requests_total{cluster=~"$cluster", api=~"${api}"}[5m]))) by(api,status)

sum(sum(increase(kong_request_status_count{cluster=~"$cluster", api=~"${api}",status_code!~"2..|3..|4.."}[5m])) by (api, status_code) / ignoring(api, status_code) group_left sum(increase(kong_request_status_count{cluster=~"$cluster", api=~"${api}"}[5m]))) by(api,status_code)
(host) * on (instance) group_left(nodename) node_load1
(node_load1) * on (instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info{job=~".*node-exporter"}
sum(irate(container_cpu_user_seconds_total{image!="", container_label_com_docker_swarm_service_name=~"$service"}[5m])) by (name)
sum(irate(container_cpu_user_seconds_total{image!="", container_label_com_docker_swarm_service_name=~"$service"}[5m])) by (name)
sum(rate(kong_request_count{cluster=~"$cluster", api=~"${api}"}[5m])) by (api)
sum(kong_latency_time{cluster=~"$cluster", api=~"${api}"}) by (api)
